column4: esUSUL: How does one go about encouraging the developers of Ubuntu to include OpenOffice Base in the default install? I have gotten used to it being installed in Windows when I run the installer there. Is it such a big package that it won fit on the CD?
I would think it is more likely that it isn't used as often.
If I run the suggested ¨sudo apt-get install openoffice.org-base¨ to get it installed, What files can I copy to a flashdrive to install on other PCs. Is there a script?
you could download the .deb to copy to another pc
